summary: Email correspondence between a partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP and an Assistant United States Attorney regarding a witness's journal entries related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The attorney is following up on a request for the witness to share journal entries and other documents to assist in the investigation.

persons.name: Partner Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: Attorney from Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who is communicating with the Assistant United States Attorney about obtaining a witness's journal entries related to Epstein and Maxwell.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Prosecutor from the Southern District of New York who is requesting journal entries and other documents from a witness regarding her experiences with Epstein and Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject of the investigation, with the witness having experiences involving him.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject of the investigation alongside Epstein, with the witness having experiences involving her.

connections.description: Both are subjects of the investigation, with the witness having experiences involving both individuals.
Corresponding regarding the investigation and the request for a witness's journal entries.

events.title: Follow-up Request for Journal Entries
events.description: Email correspondence where an Assistant United States Attorney follows up on a request for a witness to share journal entries and other documents related to her experiences with Epstein and Maxwell.

locations: Southern District of New York, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A witness has journal entries that helped refresh her recollection of events involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The U.S. Attorney's Office is actively seeking these journal entries and other relevant documents from the witness to assist in the investigation.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative efforts into Epstein and Maxwell as of January 2020.
The communication is between a defense attorney (Boies Schiller Flexner) and a federal prosecutor, suggesting the witness may be represented by counsel.
